Open source OpenInviterTM (Open InviterTM) is a free import contacts (addressbook) script from email providers like O2, OperaMail, Clevergo, Plaxo, Web.de, Techemail, Mail2World, Mynet.com, AOL, Gawab, Zapakmail, Wp.pt, Yahoo!, Pochta, Uk2, Sapo.pt, Inbox.com, IndiaTimes, Aussiemail, GMX.net, MSN, Doramail, Inet, Canoe, Xing, Live/Hotmail, Hushmail, Azet, Abv, Lycos, Freemail, Mail.in, FastMail, Bigstring, Rediff, Meta, Libero, India, YouTube, Kids, Atlas, Rambler, Bordermail, Apropo, 5Fm, Nz11, LinkedIn, GMail, Yandex, Grafitti, Evite, Mail.com, Walla, Netaddress, Virgilio, KataMail, Mail.ru, Popstarmail, Terra, Care2, Interia or social portals like Flingr, Badoo, MySpace, Faces, Ning, Mycatspace, Perfspot, Konnects, Facebook, Multiply, Bebo, Fdcareer, Mevio, NetLog, Meinvz, Motortopia, Hyves, Vimeo, Xanga, Vkontakte, Cyworld, Skyrock, Lovento, Friendfeed, Flixster, Eons, Friendster, Livejournal, Bookcrossing, Famiva, Twitter, Tagged, Hi5, Brazencareerist, Kincafe, Flickr, Koolro, Xuqa, Orkut, Plurk, Plazes, Last.fm, Mydogspace. This contacts importer script is integrating with content management systems (aka CMS) like jamit job, Wordpress, SimpleMachines Forum (SMF), Joomla1.0, PunBB, Joomla, RoundCube, Vwebmail, Etano, Boonex Dolphin, Dating Pro, Drupal, E107, myBB, Social Engine, phpizabi, phpFoX, Social Engine 4, nowFire, joovili, PHPMELODY, Buddy Zone, JamRoom, Atmail5, symfony, PhpBB, vBulletin. Open Inviter is written in PHP 5 (no database required but cURL or wget required) and running on any webserver (tested on Apache) offering advanced tell a friend features. OpenInviterTM is a free self hosted solution that does not use a third party gateway (or API) to import contacts.Download it at: OpenInviter
